title: Lyte, do you play Dawngate?
body: Because I'm watching a developer stream Dawngate, and in the game there's someone named 'RiotLyte'. I doubt it's you, but I wanted to check anyway.

replies.body:
I am absolutely positive Lyte has played Dawngate. 

He has to have considering he posts so much about the tribunal and honour systems. He should take other games', specifically Dawngates', approaches into consideration considering he is so invested into these topics. Add that to him having multiple decently ranked League accounts and you have quite some certainty.

Whether or not he'd play as 'RiotLyte' however is up for debate.
